game.name: Free the emoji GOLD
game.description:
This addictive and funny adventure game will give you everything you need to say goodbye to the feeling of boredom. You have to challenge your brain and fingers to win when you enter this awesome game. It will be amazing to control a ball in this brand new platform game called Free the Emoji Gold. This ball is captured by the evil ball and now you have taken the responsibility to escape the yellow emoji, the girlfriend of red ball. 
Put your jumping and running skill to test to complete all the levels and rooms in this one of the best platform games! There are lots of enemies, including the evil brothers, the tiger ball, the roller ball and the angry ball. Use your mouse to make the ball roll, bounce and jump to reach it to the key through you can open the door and exit the place. Do not hesitate in climbing the walls to sort out the different rooms in this cool html5 ball game!
Angry climb movements, awesome graphics and easy controls are the major features of this free online adventure game. We have countless ball running games on atmegame.com. You can try them out when you feel free and are looking forward to improve your knowledge and sharpen your brain power. Our all games do not ask you to download app or software to have fun. Good luck for a happy gaming experience!!
